songs.title: You (Demo) (Mix 1)
songs.lyrics:
[Intro]
(You, you, you, you-oh-oh-oh)

[Verse 1]
You don't know me like you think you do
You don't own me but I can't cut you loose
(You, you, you, you-oh-oh-oh-oh)

[Pre-Chorus 1]
Everybody thinks that you're a star
But underneath I see just what you are
We both know that we can never change
Walking slowly through the dust and flames

[Chorus]
(You!) Yeah, you break me down
Yeah, you shut me out
But it's all about you, you
(I) know what you're about
But I need you now
'Cause it's all about you, you

[Post-Chorus]
You, oh-oh-oh-oh-oh
You, you (You!)
(You, you-oh-oh-oh)

[Verse 2]
You don't love me like you think you do
You don't know I'm just as bad as you

[Pre-Chorus 2]
Everybody thinks that I'm the heart
Of every party but it's just the start
Deep down I know that we're just the same
Burning slowly through the dust and flames

[Chorus]
(You!) Yeah, you break me down
Yeah, you shut me out
But it's all about you, you
(I) know what you're about
But I need you now
'Cause it's all about you, you

[Post-Chorus 2]
You, oh-oh-oh-oh-oh
You, you
You, oh-oh-oh-oh-oh
(You, you-oh-oh-oh)

[Bridge]
You don't know me like you think you do, oh-oh-oh-oh
You don't know I'm just as bad as you, oh-oh-oh-oh-oh

You, oh-oh-oh-oh-oh
(You, you-oh-oh-oh)
You, oh-oh-oh-oh-oh
(You, you-oh-oh-oh)
You, oh-oh-oh-oh-oh
(You, you-oh-oh-oh)

[Chorus]
(You!) Yeah, you break me down
Yeah, you shut me out
But it's all about you, you
(I) know what you're about
But I need you now
'Cause it's all about you, you

[Post-Chorus 3]
(You!)
You, oh-oh-oh-oh-oh
You, you
(You!)
You, you

[Outro]
You don't know me like you think you do, oh-oh-oh-oh
